title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4211.1 - Commission approval required
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4211.1 - Commission approval required

State Regulations

Before entering upon the discharge of their duties the
following officials employed by an association shall be approved in writing by
the commission, viz.: all racing secretaries, handicappers, clerks of the
scales, timers, examining veterinarians and track veterinarians, and such other
persons as the commission may designate from time to time because of their
importance in the actual conduct of racing. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4211.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
